Ref: CXP062/2023

To manage the wastewater treatment plant operations team for the production of reclaimed water to meet the required standards.

Criteria:
National Diploma in related field or assessed equivalent competence
Minimum of five (5) years supervisory/ management experience in water/ wastewater treatment industry
Capable in process diagnostics, plant maintenance and cost optimization
Able to manage and lead staff
Computer literacy in the Google Workspace tools and experience with Cloud Computing and SAAS tools such as DocuSign, Lucid Chart, etc…
Fluent communication and report writing skills
